titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Employee Fairness Act of 2019
Department of Veterans Affairs Employee Fairness Act of 2019
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to modify authorities relating to the collective bargaining of employees in the Veterans Health Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Department of Veterans Affairs Employee Fairness Act of 2019
This bill repeals provisions excluding any matter or question concerning professional conduct or competence; peer review; or the establishment, determination, or adjustment of employee compensation from the applicability of collective bargaining rights for Veterans Health Administration employees.
